title: PBE account (Website not working)
body: Umm i recently got an email from Riot Games stating that i was accepted to try out the PBE so i went on the website but couldnt register an account....

replies.body:
When you say the website wasn't working, could you get to the site itself and couldn't register? Or were you unable to get the website to load at all?

If you're not able to get the website to load at all, try using this link instead.

If you're seeing the error 500 page, this could be caused by something while your connection is en route to our servers. While I don't have a concrete fix for this, I do know that using a VPN such as Hot Spot Shield or CyberGhost has worked for players in the past.

Hit me back up and let me know how this worked out!

> try using this link instead

what link?

Looks like the hyperlink didn't get in there correctly {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Let's try this again, click [**here**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)!
